mapper.select:
select * from patient_card where card_no = #{cardNo} AND card_type=#{cardType} AND fk_tenant_id=#{tenantId} and del_flag=false
and fk_pt_id != #{nePatientId}

select CONCAT('patient_visit_',(@i:=@i+1))as id,(@j:=@j+1) as id_no, 'patient_visit' as down_type,p.id as fk_patient_id, p.name as patient_name, pc.card_type, pc.card_no, IFNULL(pv.start_date,'1975-01-01') as start_date,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') as end_date, e.del_flag,NOW() as create_time,e.fk_tenant_id from patient_card pc left join (select id ,his_pt_id,start_date from ( select fk_patient_id as id, his_pt_id,DATE_FORMAT(MAX(in_time),'%Y-%m-%d') as start_date from patient_visit group by fk_patient_id,his_pt_id) tt) pv on pc.card_no = pv.his_pt_id left join patient p on p.id = pc.fk_pt_id left join hd_patient_extend e on p.id = e.id, (select @i:=0) b ,(select @j:=0) c where e.del_flag = 0 and !ISNULL(p.id) and !ISNULL(pc.card_no) and e.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId}
and p.id = #{fkPatientId}
